definition: first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: Now about 60 percent of rural fish farmers in Bangladesh are women.
sentences.chinese: 現在，孟加拉國大約60%的農村養魚人是婦女。

sentences.english: At the age of 14 Sohel from Bangladesh was the main breadwinner in his family.
sentences.chinese: 孟加拉國14歲的Sohel是家中的主要養家人。

sentences.english: Makeshift bamboo bridges span small waterways all over Bangladesh.
sentences.chinese: 橫跨在小水路上的臨時竹橋遍佈孟加拉國。

sentences.english: A member of a people living in Bangladesh and West Bengali.
sentences.chinese: 一個住在孟加拉國和西孟加拉的民族。

sentences.english: Many factors caused the Bangladesh well intervention to become a protracted struggle.
sentences.chinese: 許多因素導致孟加拉國水井事件拖成了疑難雜症。

sentences.english: Sheikh Hasina met Sunday with the military.
sentences.chinese: 孟加拉國總理哈西娜星期天會見了軍方官員。

sentences.english: Paksey Bridge is the second largest bridge project next to Jamuna Bridge in Bangladesh.
sentences.chinese: 帕克西橋是孟加拉國繼賈木納橋後的第二大橋樑工程。

sentences.english: The Rohingya people living in Bangladesh. They are neglected by the world.
sentences.chinese: 活在孟加拉國的羅興亞人，他們被世界遺忘了。

sentences.english: And Bangaldesh will overtake India in 3012.
sentences.chinese: 孟加拉國將於3012年超過印度。

sentences.english: They also have one of the highest rates of early marriage in the world in Bangladesh.
sentences.chinese: 他們也有在世界上早婚孟加拉國率最高的國家之一。

sentences.english: Bangladeshi student of WSU came to pick me up.
sentences.chinese: 威諾娜州立大學的一位孟加拉國籍學生過來接我。

sentences.english: This is the postcode category of Bhola, Bangladesh.
sentences.chinese: 這是孟加拉國波拉的郵政編碼分類。

sentences.english: County Rangamati Chittagong Hill Tracts in Bangladesh is one of the three counties.
sentences.chinese: 蘭加馬蒂縣是孟加拉國吉大港山區的三個縣之一。

sentences.english: A Bangladeshi student of WSU came to pick me up.
sentences.chinese: 威諾娜州立大學的一位孟加拉國籍學生過來接我。

sentences.english: Now, it is one of the world's most water-scarce countries.
sentences.chinese: 可現今的孟加拉國卻是世界上最缺水的國家之一。

sentences.english: This Act shall be known as the "Plant Varieties Act of Bangladesh".
sentences.chinese: 本法應當稱爲“孟加拉國植物品種法。”

definition: East Timor (officially Democratic Republic of Timor-Leste)
Nauru, island country in the southwestern Pacific (Tw)

pinyin: Wu1 zi1 bie2 ke4 si1 tan3
Sha1 wu1 di4 A1 la1 bo2

definition: Dhaka, capital of Bangladesh/(Tw) Dakar, capital of Senegal
